original_text: Then Saul went up from following the Philistines: and the Philistines went to their own place.
korean_text: 사울이 블레셋 사람들 추격하기를 그치고 올라가매 블레셋 사람들이 자기 곳으로 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: Then Saul went up from following the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사울은 블레셋 사람들을 따르다가 올라갔고

sentences.original_text: and the Philistines went to their own place
